title: Documentation - Method: projects.glossaries.create
abstract:
# Documentation - Method: projects.glossaries.create
Creates a glossary and returns the long-running operation. Returns NOT_FOUND, if the project doesn't exist.
#
content:
## HTTP request`POST https://{TRANSLATION_GDCH_ENDPOINT}/v3/{parent}/glossaries`
### Path parameters| Parameters | Parameters.1      |
|:-------------|:-----------------------------------|
| parent  | string Required. The project name. |
### Request bodyThe request body contains an instance of ` [Glossary](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/apis/vertex-ai/translation/rest/v3/projects.glossaries#Glossary) ` .
### Response bodyIf successful, the response body contains a newly created instance of ` [Operation](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/apis/vertex-ai/translation/rest/v3/projects.operations#Operation) ` .
